reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: we booked this through teletext website which we will never do again as it was to confusing we didnt no who to meet at the airport and it was a bit scary!
reviews.title: lovely once you setlle in

reviews.text: The hotel itself has got the most lovely staff, Usama and Yasser are really lovely and my boyfriend and i have kept in contact with them since! There are a lot of reviews saying the fod is horrible, however we couldnt get enough of it! Except the spinach and liver wernt bril! he bbq chicken was lovely!
reviews.title: Lovely Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The beach isnt really a beach, more like some sand (which should have mixed to make cement!) was chucked on some concrete near the sea. WEAR SEA SHOES IN THE RED SEA its beautiful sea and excellent for snorkelling, but gettin in there isnt so easy!
reviews.title: Depends on Your Requirements
